biotools.summary:
An R shiny web-application for exploratory targeted mutual rank-based coexpression analyses integrated with user-provided supporting information.

Transcriptomic data can uncover complex biological processes in part through the improved understanding of gene coexpression patterns.

bioschemas.name: MutRank
